actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide that the reservoir formed by the lock and dam referred to as the "Jones Bluff lock and dam" on the Alabama River, Ala. shall hereafter be known as the R. E. "Bob" Woodruff Reservoir.

summary.text: Provides for the designation of the reservoir formed by the lock and dam referred to as the "Jones Bluff Lock and Dam" on the Alabama River, Alabama, as the R. E. "Bob" Woodruff Reservoir, in honor of the late Probate Judge R. E. "Bob" Woodruff of Lowndes County, Alabama.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the reservoir formed by the lock and dam referred to as the "Jones Bluff lock and dam" on the Alabama River, Ala. shall hereafter be known as the R. E. "Bob" Woodruff Reservoir.
